title: What was the best online learning experience you had? - Quora

response.answer_text: Online learning is preferred by individuals who are not able to make it for classes in a conventional college or institution owing to many reasons. However, learning online isn’t a forced choice today, in fact, more and more people are now inclining towards online learning because of the numerous benefits it brings. Some of which include: Flexibility, it gives you the flexibility of learning at your comfort. If you are a working professional or you’re undergoing an additional course online along with your regular classroom program, online learning allows you to manage your time effectively and juggle between things in a smooth manner. Another benefit online learning brings is the reduced costs because it involves no commuting cost. There are no expenses related to transport whether public or personal. Online learning even promotes enhanced Instructor - Student Time because in online classes students get guided discussions and personal talk time with their professors and lecturers.

I love online learning! Some years ago I interested myself more and more for online marketing. In order to get first some basic knowledge and later on more specific skills I book a bunch of onle courses at Udemy. Udemy is the leading marketplace for online courses of all kind of topics. It was great! Because I could watching the courses and learning whenever it was suitable for me. Really flexible.  Building up my websites I continued with tutorials and webinars for different subjects, e.g. Chatbot building with Mary Kathryn Johnson Again, a great experience! High quality content with a perfect match between theory and practical lessons.  Inspired by these motivating experiences I subscribed last year at a German online education istitution and made successfully my degree as “Online Marketing Manager”. It took me less time and was even more intense than an on-campus degree.  Finally, in order to share my personnel experiences with online learning, I am setting up my distance education website to tell more people about the opportunities to improve skills and earn accredited degrees online. The Distance Education Guide Africa - improve your skills or earn your degree! describes in details the pros and cons of available concepts, there are background articles and recommendations what you can do.
